description: Climate Risk Index - Hazards, health risks, vulnerability factors
Child Poverty - Measures poverty levels, deprivation rates, income ratios, etc.
Child Mortality - Tracks mortality rates and deaths across age groups 0-24 years
Child Mortality by Cause of Death
Demography - Population statistics, age groups, fertility, life expectancy, etc.
Education data like literacy rates, completion rates, out-of-school rates, etc.
HIV prevention, treatment and transmission stats
Vaccination coverage rates for BCG, DTP, polio, measles and other key vaccines
Key nutrition indicators like stunting, wasting, breastfeeding, anemia and diet
Child Marriage, tracks early marriage rates, related outcomes and socioeconomic factors
WASH services in healthcare facilities (availability of basic/limited/no services for water, sanitation, hygiene, cleaning, and health care waste management).
Household WASH indicators at subnational (Admin1) level (water accessibility, sanitation type, hygiene facilities, wealth quintiles, and residence).
Household WASH indicators at national level (drinking water, sanitation, hygiene facilities, open defecation, safely managed services, and service quality).
